layout.title: Personalized NOS staking intelligence
layout.subtitle: Paste a Solana wallet or staking account to unlock lifecycle analytics, transaction traces, and bespoke rewards insights.

walletInput.title: Staking Analytics
walletInput.description: Enter your Solana wallet address to unlock comprehensive insights into your NOS staking performance and transaction history.
walletInput.label: Wallet Address
walletInput.helper: Wallet lookups stay cached while the dashboard is open; use “Change Wallet” to clear or switch addresses.

hero.title: Staking Analysis Dashboard
hero.description: Comprehensive insights into your NOS staking performance with real-time analytics, detailed transaction history, and rich visualizations powered by the live staking API.

disclaimer.alpha: Alpha release — please don't use this as your primary source. Always double-check the figures before making decisions.
disclaimer.feedback: Mistakes can happen; report them in the Discord channel, on Twitter, or through GitHub for quick follow-ups.

defaults.modeRequesting: Requesting sync job from the NOS API…
defaults.modeCached: Loading previously cached summary and event data.
defaults.detailsProvisioning: Provisioning a background worker to process the latest NOS activity.
defaults.detailsPromptSync: If this wallet was never synced, click “Sync Latest” to start indexing on-chain history.
defaults.etaSoon: Usually ready in a few seconds…

modeMessages.initial: Initial sync may take a couple of minutes while we index historical activity.
modeMessages.incremental: Checking for the latest NOS activity and updating cached analytics.
modeMessages.force: Rebuilding cached analytics from scratch. This can take a bit longer than usual.
modeMessages.forceNoChanges: Full sync completed successfully but analytics were already current. No new signatures were detected.
modeMessages.forceUpToDate: Full sync completed successfully, but cached analytics were already current—no new NOS activity was found.

overlays.initialHint: You can keep this tab open; data will continue to populate as batches finish.

loadingList.retrieving: Retrieving the latest saved analytics for this wallet.
loadingList.firstTime: First time here? Run Sync Latest to index on-chain history and refresh data.

overlays.loadingFooter: Cached loads typically finish within a few seconds. The overlay closes automatically once fresh data is ready.

toasts.syncStartedFull: Job {id} queued for wallet {wallet}. Rebuilding analytics from the ground up.
toasts.syncStartedIncremental: Job {id} queued for wallet {wallet}. Progress will appear below.
toasts.syncFailedDescription: Sync job failed unexpectedly. Please try again shortly.
toasts.progressUnavailableDescription: Unable to stream sync progress from the API.
toasts.statusUnavailableDescription: Unable to retrieve sync status from the API.
toasts.syncCompleteDescription: Wallet analytics have been refreshed with the latest data.
toasts.noActivityDescription: This wallet has no NOS-related transactions yet. We will continue checking for new activity.
toasts.fullSyncNoChangesTitle: Full sync finished with no changes
toasts.fullSyncNoChangesDescription: Full sync completed successfully, but no differences were detected. Cached analytics were already current.
toasts.alreadyUpToDateDescription: No new NOS transactions were found since your previous sync.

limit.message: This wallet has more than 20,000 NOS transactions. Due to safety reasons it will not be processed automatically. If you still need analytics, please contact nos.plus on Twitter, create a GitHub request, or reach out in the nos.plus Discord channel.

flow.title: NOS Flow Analysis
flow.subtitle: Visual breakdown of inflows and outflows

distribution.title: Event Distribution
distribution.subtitle: Breakdown of transaction types by count

timeline.title: Activity Timeline
timeline.subtitle: Historical flow of staking events over time

eventsTable.title: Transaction History
eventsTable.subtitle: {count, plural, one {{count} event found} other {{count} events found}}

toast.failed: Unable to copy signature. Please try again.

descriptions.activeWithDuration: Stake is currently active with a {duration} lock period.
descriptions.active: Stake is currently active and earning rewards.
descriptions.readyWithDate: Unstaking completed on {date}. Funds are ready to withdraw or restake.
descriptions.ready: Unstaking completed. Funds are ready to withdraw or restake.
descriptions.inactive: Stake account exists but currently holds no NOS.
descriptions.unknown: Stake address discovered, but account details could not be loaded.
descriptions.not_staked: No stake account detected for this wallet.
